com.hcs.prototype.hcs_prototype

Class User

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.hcs.prototype.hcs_prototype.User

  • public class User
extends java.lang.Object

    User Class Singleton

    The user class implements authenticated login and register for users. The user is authenticated against a list of users found in local storage. The User class is a singleton for streamlined access across multiple activities. The object is accessed via User.getUser() and actions can be taken on this user object.
    Since:
    0.1 //TODO: version numbers in github

      • PREFS_NAME

        The name of the shared Preferences fiel that the user data is stored in.

      • username

        String username

        The user's username.

      • password

        private java.lang.String password

        String password

        The user's password

      • context

        private Context context

        Context context

        The context which is necessary for loading the preferences file (acceptable to pass the current activity with this)

      • currentUser

        private boolean currentUser

        boolean currentUser = false

        Indicates whether the current user is authenticated (as it is possble to create a user without authentication - but further actions cannot be applied to this user without calling login() or register() first)

      • user

        private static User user

        User user = null

        The user object that represents the currently stored user, the class stores its own object - necessary for being a singleton.

      • score

        private int score

        int score

        The user's current score
